data.text:
We stayed 5 days at Sheraton Bur Dubai and there is only good things to say: the staff are lovely , the hotel is just wow and the room is clean and spacious.

The staff are very friendly, courteous and helpful. They made our stay so enjoyable and comfortable.

I would like to thank all the team! Especially  Mr TULSI ( house keeping) and ABHISHEK ( Hotel entrance ) they do their job perfectly. Thank you again for the warm welcome and to ask if we need anything. 

There was this guy at the entrance  ( a black guy) im trying hard but canâ€™t remember his name though. He was simply amazing. Very nice person and always assisting with a smile. 

The breakfast was very good! 

Free shuttle to Dubai mall , to kite beach and outlet. 

Most friendly and helpful staff ever.
Everything about the hotel was exceptional. We really enjoyed our time there. Will definitely be coming back.

Regards,
Ms Persand from Mauritius
data.title: Amazing staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear sheenp2023,

Thank you for choosing to stay at the Four Points by Sheraton Bur Dubai and providing your honest feedback.

Your kind words mean the world to us, and we're thrilled to hear that you had a positive experience with us. It's our goal to create memorable and enjoyable stays for our guests, and knowing that we achieved that for you is truly rewarding.

Once again, thank you for your valued feedback and we hope you choose to stay with us again when your travels bring you back to the area.

Sincerely,
Ahmed Al-Esawy
Assistant Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel ManagementDXB

data.text:
Visiting Dubai was a whirlwind of excitement, and staying at the Four Points By Sheraton Bur Hotel added a touch of luxury to the experience. 
The hotel's sleek design and comfortable rooms provided a welcome retreat after a day of exploring the bustling city. 
The staff were incredibly hospitable, making sure every need was met with a smile. Plus, the hotel's location near Dubai's iconic landmarks made it easy to navigate the city. Overall, sleeping at Four Points By Sheraton Bur Hotel enhanced my Dubai adventure, leaving me with fond memories of both the city and my stay.
data.title: A Cozy Stay at Four Points by Sheraton Bur

data.text: Great hotel but prices are higher. Far from metro stations if considering the walk. Hotel itself is clean, staff are helpful and we enjoyed our stay. Just the distance from the public transport is not that great. As a tourists, we needed to be nearby metro but still good property to stay in
data.title: Nice Hotel but far from Metro

data.text: It's my first time with this Four Points by Sheraton and absolutely loved it. We reached very late at night and ordered for in room dining and it was absolutely amazing food one time, the foods were amazing and very fresh and it was delivered by Pankaj he was very polite. Special thanks to Aastha she was very professional warm at Purani Dilli and she was very anticipated for my kid needs and always smiling. Service at Purani Dilli was excellent. Really appreciate this experience. Coming back again very soon.
data.title: Good food,Good service.

data.text: Wonderful stay here. Extremely friendly staff. Very nice hotel. Clean. Spacious room. Fridge. Large TV. Tea and Coffee facilities. Comfy Bed. Lots of storage. Nice Bufffet breakfast, offering eggs to order. Great location. Good rooftop pool with plenty of comfortable sunbeds. There is a sauna. Unfortunately, the women's sauna was a let down as it's electric and did not really heat up to feel you're in a Sauna. Would definitely recommend and revisit.
data.title: Fabulous experience - Good Location
